Find Friends Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

Right-click a class in the Project Explorer window and select Find»Friends from the shortcut menu to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to find all friends of a specific class in the project.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • List of friends—Lists all friends found in the project for the class.

If the item only has one friend, LabVIEW highlights the child in the Project Explorer window.

You also can use the Find:Friends property to find friends programmatically.
